long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Olive Wallet is a powerful blockchain wallet plugin designed to provide users with a convenient, secure, and efficient experience in managing and trading digital assets. The current version focuses on the transfer functionality of the DO Network blockchain and extends support to various blockchains such as Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin (BTC), and Binance Smart Chain (BNB). Olive Wallet will soon offer a range of features including token exchange and cross-chain bridging. We are committed to delivering a comprehensive platform for digital asset management and trading to our users.
